title: (x) Lauren B Jewels - ITC Fenice, Shelley Andante {Matthew Buchanan}
content:
I was asked to reproduce the logo, since the original files were lost. However I cannot match the fonts they originally used. Thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [laurenb.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013195854/http:/typophile.com/files/laurenb.jpg) | 18.04 KB |
author: hackum

comments.content: The Lauren B part appears to be [ITC Fenice](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013195854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/itc-fenice/) [sqooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013195854/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed).

And the Jewels might be [Shelley Andante Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013195854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/shelley-script/shelley-andante-script/) with some [italicising (?)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013195854/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19418) going on.
Wow, thanks. I think you are right about both!
